description:
Protecting The Injured In St. Paul

At Sand Law in St. Paul, Minnesota, we focus our practice exclusively on personal injury law and helping innocent accident victims recover maximum compensation for the damages they sustained as the result of another party's negligence or wrongdoing.

Serving clients throughout the Twin Cities region and the rest of Minnesota, the attorneys at our law firm aggressively fight to protect the rights and interests of individuals and families dealing with personal injury and wrongful death claims involving motor vehicle accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, dog bites, child injuries, recreational injuries and all other similar claims.

Highly Rated, Award-Winning Advocates

Our law firm's founders, Rick Sand and William Anthony Sand, have years of trial experience dealing with insurance companies to secure the compensation and benefits our clients deserve. Working as a team and utilizing a vast network of investigators, medical consultants and other professional resources, we can build the strongest case possible to help you obtain the justice you seek.

Regarded as two of the top personal injury attorneys in the region, we have received high ratings for our service and professionalism from our peers as well as from our satisfied clients. This means that you can expect to receive the highest level of advocacy possible for your case from a trustworthy attorney fully committed to your specific needs and goals.

No Upfront Fees And Free Initial Consultations

If you were hurt or lost a loved one due to the negligent, careless or unlawful actions of someone else, you can trust Sand Law for the compassionate assistance and effective support you need. To find out more, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation.
